CmdLine: echo '@testing http://nl.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing' >> /etc/apk/repositories &&     apk upgrade &&     addgroup -S www-data &&     adduser -D -h /var/www -S -G www-data www-data &&     apk add --update         supervisor         nginx         php7@testing         php7-bcmath@testing         php7-bz2@testing         php7-calendar@testing         php7-ctype@testing         php7-curl@testing         php7-dom@testing         php7-fileinfo@testing         php7-fpm@testing         php7-gd@testing         php7-iconv@testing         php7-imap@testing         php7-intl@testing         php7-json@testing         php7-mbstring@testing         php7-mcrypt@testing         php7-mysqli@testing         php7-mysqlnd@testing         php7-openssl@testing         php7-phar@testing         php7-pdo@testing         php7-pdo_mysql@testing         php7-session@testing         php7-tokenizer@testing         php7-tidy@testing         php7-xmlwriter@testing         php7-zip@testing         php7-xml@testing         php7-xmlreader@testing &&     rm /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf &&     ln -sf /dev/stdout /var/log/nginx/access.log &&     ln -sf /dev/stderr /var/log/nginx/error.log &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run
